title: Oliver Grant
text:
Thomas Oliver Grant is a former <a href="Scotland%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Scotland</a> international <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player.
About.
Ollie Etienne Grant is best known for his father, <a href="Chris%20Grant%20%28footballer%29">Chris Grant</a> a former (AFL) Australian Football League player. Ollie was born with a congenital heart defect affecting the way blood flowed through his heart. The information about Oliver's heart was announced <a href="https%3A//amp.heraldsun.com.au/news/victoria/surgery-saves-bulldogs-champion-chris-grants-baby/news-story/75425d381456bc1289a94f4c03522bb8">here</a> by the Herald Sun.
Family.
His sister <a href="Isabella%20Grant">Isabella Grant</a> an AFLW player for the <a href="Western%20Bulldogs">Western Bulldogs</a>.
References.
 * Oliver Etienne Grant, September 7th 2007.
